Text.Name: Body_ModifierTest
Text.Desc: Demonstrate a miracle with added modifiers, which will be removed if released again.

Text.Name: Magic_Body_JingXi
Text.Desc: Begins intense breathing at the designated location with an efficiency 100x that of the normal method. The chest and lungs will be overloaded after using this spell and the breathing efficiency will be drastically reduced in the next ten days.
Text.TargetDesc: Select a location to start Breathing.

Text.Name: Magic_Body_TuJin
Text.Desc: Unleashes Devouring Mouth. Using this secret body can accelerate the body functions and directly devour energy from heaven and earth for replenishment. Release the skill again to stop this effect.

Text.Name: Magic_Body_ChiYi1
Text.Desc: Uses the True Qi generated by the Rejected Body to run through the body and drastically increase the consumption rate of lifespan and remold speed. Release the skill again to stop this effect.

Text.Name: Magic_Body_ChiYi2
Text.Desc: Uses the True Qi generated by the Rejected Body to run through the body and drastically increase the consumption rate of lifespan and remold efficiency. Release the skill again to stop this effect.

Text.Name: Magic_Body_Banyunqixue
Text.Desc: Costs 50 Life Essence to direct energy from the whole body to heal one's own injuries, lasts 100 sec.
